name: 01-fizz_buzz
description: Specifically: *Write a program that prints the numbers from 1 to 100. But for multiples of three print "Fizz" instead of the number and for the multiples of five print "Buzz". For numbers which are multiples of both three and five print "FizzBuzz".*

scripts.build: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.deploy: npm run build && git add . && git commit -m "Building for production" && git push heroku main

author: Kathryn Herod
